snippet: Residents of Cambridge, Mass., are having a hard time squaring the accusations against the Tsarnaev brothers with the diversity they view as inherent in the city.
abstract: Residents of Cambridge, Mass, are having hard time squaring accusations against Boston Marathon bombing suspects Tamerlan and Dzhokhar Tsarnaev with diversity they view as inherent to fabric of city.
lead_paragraph: Residents of Cambridge, Mass., are having a hard time squaring the accusations against the Tsarnaev brothers with the diversity they view as inherent in the city.

headline.seo: Cambridge Struggles to Accept Marathon Bombing Link
headline.main: Link to Marathon Bombing Rattles City Known for Its Tolerance
headline.print_headline: Link to Marathon Bombing Rattles City Known for Its Tolerance
